Newfs Of Nyarlathotep

  • Adventure Log
  • Investigators
  • The Carlyle Expedition
  • Trello
  • Roll 20
  • Eight: We Gotta Stop Meeting Like This

    Witnesses to Jacksons murder, the party flashback to the adventures they’ve shared over the years, including a deadly snake cult, a meeting with a lost race in the Canadian arctic, and an impossible manor in the Hebrides.

  • Seven: Father of Maggots

    The party head for the temple as the Kharisari head home to protect it, a climactic confrontation errupts at the prison of the Father of Maggots, and what’s inside room 410 at the Hotel Chelsea.

  • Six: Bad to Worse

    Mendoza strikes again, Narya’s life hangs in the balance, Jackson takes matters into his own hands, and the party quickly exits Puno.

  • Five: Fire in the Lake

    Narya shares local folklore, the Kharasari attack the man-made island, and de Mendoza re-surfaces.

  • Four: Onward to Puno

    Jon retakes the golden ward and it’s purpose is revealed, Charlotte finds a forbidden tome, and Aanlise gets them to Puno, where a friend of Jacksons is in hiding.
